document_data.mainbody:
Lady Shyrrhr, born Larelda Shyrrhr Mallowdar, was a Lady of the Court inhabiting Waterdeep, the City of Splendors, during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Lady Shyrrhrs home was located on the south side of Waterdeep Way just west of the Street of the Sword in Waterdeeps Castle Ward.
